column4: hi. how to install webcamstudio or is there any other equivalent available?
is that supposed to be a package?
when i try to install this: http://www.ws4gl.org/download/installing-on-ubuntu message appears "The module webcamstudio is not loaded.  Virtual webcam will not be available."
those are debian packages ... do you know by chance if those are supposed to work at all in ubuntu?
I have no idea. All I know is that lots of people have problems with that and I couldn't find any solution http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1393658
Maybe there is somewhere a proper equivalent for webcamstudio?
as i havent read the project page and you havent mentioned the function - i dont know ;)
I want to use chatroulette. I can't get in. My webcam is not working as well.
first try to get cheese to work - some kind of default app to access and use webcams
cheese is not recognizing my Creative webcam.
then check out your webcams model and search for that one in combination with your ubuntu-version
such devices usualy have a clear model-string/name
Bus 002 Device 004: ID 041e:4045 Creative Technology, Ltd Live! Cam Voice
now use that and feed the search engine of your choice combined with your distri-version
with some luck you arent the first one trying to get that specific hw to work
good luck - cant help you further here
chees found my laptop webcam, but chatroulette is still not working.
i have no ide about those topics - as i dont use em. please focus on the channel and/or websearches - not on single persons in the chat.
